title: Column Alias Not Displayed Correctly in Expression Builder
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the Expression Builder still shows the old column name when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the Expression Builder and double-clicking the first column name, the original column name is displayed in the builder instead of the alias name.
EB: In the Expression Builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking the first column name, the expected behavior is that it should display the alias name as specified in SCR 78193 instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Expression Builder.
2. Select the dataset containing columns with aliases.
3. Double-click on the first column name.
